The well's trajectory

A great improvement in net present value

ionic interactions

With quality and quantity both increased
Poses a challenge to the industry of food:
To revalue waste
For streams complex in chemical and physical traits
Ionic and hydrophobic interactions too
Concentrations low make regular processes moot;
Models must be used to predict what ensues.

Were studied with Group Contribution models found;
Solubility was tested

Into activity coefficients of the light.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3Aee3c2dc9-fc2f-46fd-818e-a17e61c97cf0;EN
Error;"Planetaria obey the way
that clockworks work. Amusingly however

Russia
to laser information from
a Phobos lander on a Martian moon
to earth
the bad news is that Einstein's thesis may
then be why lasers by some millimetres
miss their target at a decent range
of over two
but the good news is
that as we try to learn more of our ether
errors oftentimes inspire change.";Interplanetary laser ranging: analysis for implementation in planetary science missions;"A task so grand
The structure and properties of solar land;
Accurate measurements made with care
Radiometric tracking systems there.
Laser ranging for Earth-orbiting satellites
Sub-centimeter accuracy
For interplanetary laser ranging too
An active space segment must ensue.
The science return from such a mission
Would be great advances in planetary geodesy's vision.
Though laser data should be accompanied by more
To maximize the system's science store.
Radio systems remain preferred choice for many orbiters still
And much more accurate clocks are needed to fulfill.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3Abd728e02-f403-4cea-9e2b-65b04b47b3f7;EN
Cancer profiles;"Innovations at the time of their
inception tend to blind us with desire
drawn to all the things we can acquire
dissonance dissolves into thin air.
We thought we caught the cancer DNA
with Watson’s project
by pairing bases complementary
connecting C with G and T with A.
Yet while this trick made us plain lyrical
we clean forgot its instabilities
in measuring – how hypocritical.
Our data shined in small varieties.
We tried to make them look statistical
but cancer profiling remains Chinese.";A critical perspective on microarray breast cancer gene expression profiling;"At first
column2: microarrays were seen as a new dawn

column1: A tool to unlock the secrets of breast cancer.
It was thought that soon its mysteries would be gone
And with it hope for those in need of an answer.
But as the technique became more popularly used
Its complexity and challenges became clear.
The data proved hard to analyze and peruse
And stability issues made results unclear.
This dissertation provides protocols to evaluate
The influence of sources of variation and noise.
It shows that subtyping schemes can be quite stable
But understanding them is still far from joys.
Though microarrays offer much potential power
We must refine our knowledge hour by hour.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3Aca47f2e0-e6af-4fc7-b4ba-36fb93182b3a;EN

or quinoa or some New Age kind of scene.
However
we optimized some drooly stuff as cool
no guru

column1: It’s called a sol-gel coating and it’s lean
it’s thermo-sensitive and like a jewel
combines with almost any metal subsoil.
Moneywise such film prevents a waste
of globally per annum eighteen zeroes
maybe… What a super-duper foil
this hybrid tetra-sulfide polymer-based
anti-aging cream for rusty heroes.";Self-Healing Corrosion Protective Sol-Gel Coatings;"This thesis so grand
Advances in the field a wondrous sight;
It speaks of tetrasulfide groups and more
To extend the life of substrate with its might.
The hybrid organic-inorganic coating so wise
Able to heal itself with great surprise;
Incorporating corrosion inhibitors too
For metal surface protection is no lie.
This thesis so inspired by art and science
Will lead to commercial systems that advance;
It's healing kinetics and mechanism known
Will help protect from corrosion all at once.
The damage closure sealed tight with this thought
Will bring us closer to what we sought.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3Af5b66298-ed00-4abd-b47c-055c22ae488b;EN

let’s hope and say: for now it saves the day.";Computational modeling of turbulent spray combustion;"In hot-diluted environments
By liquid fuel combustion
To study its behavior

With TCI

And found that adiabatic tables skew

To model evaporation and combustion with aplomb";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3Ac1c27066-a205-45f4-a7b4-e36016bc313a;EN
Glycolysis;"Don’t underestimate the might of yeast
with its fermenting glycolytic genes
producing families of proteins
quite as complex as those of man at least.
The story goes
ago
its genome. An act that implicated
so we guessed
are so obsessed and given many bucks
to date to crack the code and to reflect
on what might be the secret of its flux.
Despite the brains it took to disconnect
some double genes – this should have hit the crux
we thought! – surprise: we measured no effect…";Reducing the genetic complexity of glycolysis in Saccharomyces cerevisiae;"The sweet aroma of sugar on the tongue
A taste that lingers and brings us delight.
In yeast
To break down glucose and yield the night's
Sweet drink. But more than just a simple brew
Glycolysis holds the key to life's power
A pathway that yields energy in a shower
And building blocks for growth in every hour.
In Saccharomyces cerevisiae
This pathway is of utmost importance
For ethanol production
And other valuable compounds on the way.
Though its mechanisms still elude our grasp
Glycolysis plays a crucial role at last.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3A321bb86e-0704-436e-b095-a0f5a20c057e;EN
DIY quantum physics;"Electrons can be fixed by anarchy
in nanowire as thermometer
for an astronomer to monitor
each photon flying through the galaxy.
This is a quantum thing – so much is true
creating super sensitivity
by means of endless resistivity
but how it really worked
Therefore we started our experiment
with quasiparticles in excitation
modelling some α element
to find the right phase fluctuation
in a zero K environment.
Coming soon as homemade application…";Electrodynamics of strongly disordered superconductors;"Though knowledge of the superconducting state
Is growing
column2: with its secrets yet to be revealed

column1: We study thin films of materials that rate
High resistance in the normal state
A spatially inhomogeneous state due to strong disorder.
To probe this response we use microwave resonators
And find a gradual evolution with disorder
Deviating from the Mattis-Bardeen equations.
Our heuristic model contains an effective pair breaking parameter
That modifies the density of states; and when we compare
The assumed DoS to local tunnel spectra
Affirmative results for the lowest disordered film.
But for the most disordered film there's a strong discrepancy;
It signals a breakdown of models based on average properties.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3Aad01901d-511f-4496-ae66-301d0db92caa;EN
Welding torch;"The modern need to weld is paramount.
To weld or not to… not to fall apart
or to be sort of screwed up part by part.
World’s progress on this process we did found!
Yet
despite the famous law of conservation.
Therefore we tried by experimentation
to feed what’s lost back in the main equation.
By narrowing the ‘arc’ – no
but there where electricity at glance
jumps in between two terminals – we forged
a plasma flux with double power
enabled with a T-shaped welding torch.
Yes
column2: like the T of TU Delft by chance.";Increased power density plasma arc welding:  the effect of an added radial gas flow around the arc root;"My soul is stirred by welding's art

To constrict the arc and raise the power
And hope that it will not cower.
A survey of the literature found
Will help us build a torch profound.
Experiments with an anode non-melting
Will show us if our hopes are fleeting.
The trials of keyhole welding then began
To test if our efforts were grand.
Additional constriction of the arc was proven true
The power density increased twofold too.
Weld narrowing was also observed in this case
Our hopes for success have been embraced!";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3A2fbe9916-ef82-4c4d-958c-c6102c3eb9c6;EN

won’t make us better off. Let’s hope and say
that nudging makes the brutal obsolete.";Cybersecurity via Intermediaries: Analyzing Security Measurements to Understand Intermediary Incentives and Inform Public Policy;"Oh cybersecurity
With danger
Where intermediaries play a vital part
Their incentives shaping the outcomes of this battle vast.
Research in this field has shed light on how

And intermediaries
Provide the internet's infrastructure
This dissertation examines their role in depth
Through incident data and network logs analyzed
Four studies on ISPs
A literature review
Thus

Draagbaar ondersteunen;"Stel. Je hebt de ziekte van Duchenne
en iedere beweging van je armen
produceert een toenemend erbarmen
wegens één verstoring in een gen.
Dan zoek je goede ondersteuning én
scharnieren die je vrienden niet verlammen
naast jouw stangen-parallellogrammen
in de kroeg te staan. Geen Superman
hoef je te zijn
maar hopelijk maakt je ziekte minder stennis
kom je makkelijker de dagen door.
Hebben we voor jou voldoende kennis?
Nader onderzoek is nog gewenst voor
polsstokhoogspringen en tafeltennis.";Slender spring systems: for a close-to-body arm support for people with Duchenne muscular dystrophy;"Ondersteuning voor armen met dystrofie

Life cycle clothing;"Fashion and sustainability
are worlds apart. With pride we wear a suit
close to our heart
the earth and did exploit humanity.
Fashion
So
column3: in order for the world to stay

column1: as lovely and enchanting as it may.
Designers
If you’re sceptic still and think: who cares
if clothes are knit or weaved and glued or sewed?
Well then this news will catch you unawares.
Life cycle studies (LCA) have showed
to knit or weave is more than splitting hairs
to weave has twinty times a higher load!";Making fashion sustainable: the role of designers;"The fashion industry is fraught with wrongs
From toxic emissions to social exploitation.
Natascha's research seeks to make it strong
By empowering designers in transformation.
Life cycle thinking and assessment can show
Where hotspots lie across the product's life.
Designers must take responsibility
To create Life Cycle Clothing with ecodesign.
This self-empowerment process is a must
For successful transition of fashion trust.
Analytical methods and ecodesign approaches
Are necessary conditions for what we do.
Natascha's dissertation shows us the way;
Designers can be at the forefront today!";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3A8c66ca0a-605e-4f22-a4f1-f59b7e9ac874;EN
Asset Management;"Once upon a time
a power market was utopia.
Perhaps we suffered from myopia
but anyhow
how this would work within a DNO
a Distribution Network Operator
markets proved to be a renovator
of the money eating status quo.
This thesis shows that Asset Management
through costs and benefits consideration
saves a bill of two times ten percent
an end result that calls for admiration.
Although it may not rock the fundament

of science – who cares? – it brings optimization.";Processing Risk In Asset Management: Exploring The Boundaries Of Risk Based Optimization Under Uncertainty For An Energy Infrastructure Asset Manager;"Though DNOs face the regulator's cuts
They can still reduce their costs and risks;
Asset management is the common response
Applying CBA to network's risks.
RBO is used for upgrades and replacements
But whether it works on higher levels unclear;
The subjectivity of risk decision making
Might threaten acceptance of outcomes seen.
This research reveals that no barriers exist
To use RBO for whole system optimization;
Accepting uncertainty and subjectivity
Allows simple tools with less precision.
For this to work a sociotechnical process must be designed
And RBO applied on all levels will lead to savings of twenty percent combined.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3Ae7fcf310-749f-4e4e-bbab-78eef99d0342;EN
Keep calm and study on;"How to study how an infrastructure
scrambles to its feet again when it
goes wrong
by chaos
Make a game about an incident.
This allows to shoot the human factor
with a camera for every actor.
Film how systems are resilient.
Behold! You'll get a data sea to drown in
nine full working weeks of evidence
to binge-watch
all behaviours and their circumstance
until – luctor et emergo – ‘bouncing

back’ exposes its intelligence.";Multidisciplinary emergency management: A comparative study of coordination and performance of on-scene command teams in virtual reality exercises;;https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3A72dbceb5-4617-4f52-b5e6-24ab78e53c40;EN
Dancing in the dark ;"The slowest dance on Earth takes place in Earth.
The North Pole and the South Pole tend to sway
in pirouettes
At least
Scientists have tried to lift the dark
of planets’ viscoelasticity.
How do poles in synchronicity
make their magnetism tango spark?
If you blend a linear calculation
paired to a non-linear as you go
with some quasi-fluid estimation
you’ll see Mars steps fast and Venus slow.
Although there hardly is approximation
perhaps the twain shall meet once toe to toe.";Rotational dynamics of viscoelastic planetary bodies;;https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3A5c137348-aedb-44d3-a545-406313472a20;EN
Connectivity along the way ;"As the sun sets on the road ahead
and windy dust of ages finds no rest
endless roads connecting East and West
conceal in asphalt one long silky thread.
Next to goods like rubies
people and their stories also travel.
DNA-connections shall unravel
how we met along the way to China.
Prosperity will bring urbanisation
in places that you wouldn’t know to find.
Their growing pains demand facilitation.
By design
Diversity will beat colonisation
with a symbiotic state of mind.";The New Silk Road: Facilitating interaction between global and local within the Belt and Road Initiative;"The world is in a state of unrest
To bring peace and prosperity through the BRI
Can fail or succeed
And how it interacts with its local context.
A case study at Khorgos Gateway shows how
Global changes can affect the local space.
The aim is to create a symbiosis between them
Five goals set for ICBC to facilitate this dream.
An international network of ICBCs will then form
Where cultures meet and knowledge is shared and reborn.
An evaluation framework is presented as well
To help transfer the concept to other sites as well.
This work sparks interest and further research too
Exploring socio-spatial frames of reference anew.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3A16152a04-581c-4f8d-9fa3-3629a1d52506;EN
Alive! ;"Studying a model in the wild
takes a very special set of glasses
to see what isn’t taught in masterclasses
but what is obvious to any child.
They are alive! There are ecologies
of models
with one another
the mother of all mother’s mysteries.
What is life… but an uncertainty
longing to be modelled by a model
longing for variability?
Why are we revolving round the sun?
Don’t ask Einstein

but a random Monte Carlo run!";Uncertainty Analysis on Multi-model Ecologies: A Study on Methods to Analyse the Impact of Uncertainties in Multi-model Ecologies and their Application to the Windmaster Model;"Our modern world is a complex system of systems
Where technical and social parts interact and blend;
Multi-models are the tools to help us understand
The many uncertainties that these systems portend.
The locations of uncertainty are five in all:
Conceptual model
Technical implementation
Plus one more for multi-models - the interface.
Epistemic opacity and computational cost
Are properties that limit our knowledge of the whole;
Sensitivity analysis and calibration most
Are methods to identify and analyse this toll.
We've used a case study to prove our point:
That uncertainty analysis can be applied anoint.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3Adebfcd39-38fc-493d-8948-012bb8e02f6b;EN
Missing the buzz… ;"The thing with public transport is
rises from a crowd of interacting
agents buzzing
chaos
To study this is quite a tricky dance
a wicked mix of opposites attracting
and those being affected are affecting
just like there’s no thing as one-way romance.
Are you an agent that does not know better
than to talk
eternally? It turns out that you matter!
It’s called ‘dynamic interaction’… Thus
go write and send yourself a thank-you-letter.
Without that buzz
column2: we all would miss the bus.";En Route to Better Performance: Tackling the Complexities of Public Transport Governance;"O\u2019er cities worldwide a pressing issue lies

column1: For travelling is time-consuming
The traffic congestion limits our lives
And threatens freedom of movement we crave.
The emissions from vehicles in turn
Are causing climate change to worsen fast.
It\u2019s clear that we must find a way to learn
To make collective transport the new norm at last.
We must explore how governance can help us out
Innovations such as mobility as a service.
This research will show what it\u2019s all about;
How performance and goals can be made to converge.
The future of our cities hangs in the balance;
Our task is to make sustainable travel happen!";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3A431ffda5-275c-4670-bf32-43d863261ec2;EN

waardoor je heensnelt met een hesje aan

Nunchaku;"Two sticks connected by a rope or chain
‘danger-sticks’ they are or Nunchaku
When sportsmen fight with them the way they do
the referees are driven quite insane
Because
column3: it all just goes so quick

column1: that actually one does not see at all
It's very hard for refs to make the call
of who did what to whom and with what stick
Some technical assistance would be nice
to show the arbiter what just went down
so he can tell the truth without a crease
A real Smart-Nunchaku is the device
it should eliminate the slightest frown
and easily settle every fight in peace.";Improving Score Arbitration in the Combat Sport Nunchaku-do ;"The art of nunchucks

Is marred by referees' difficulties to keep pace
In giving sports justice

Thus

The referee the strikes
And even estimate the force behind the dwelling
Smart nunchaku technology
Can help referees give fair calls with reliability.";https://repository.tudelft.nl/islandora/object/uuid%3A7447d9e5-64a9-445a-91d4-408ab799757a;EN
